Language.Text:
A drug smuggler is operating in this system. Your mission is to intercept and destroy their ship.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %reward%

The captain looks down at a screen.
"A drug smuggler is passing through the system with a load of tempus. Your mission is to intercept the ship and destroy it.
"We'll pay %reward% if you succeed. Interested?"

"All right. I'll send the target to your computer. Just make sure you destroy the target before it leaves the system. Else we'll never find it again.
"OK, get out of here."
"Ah, Hell! What are you doing here then? Stop wasting my time!"
"What's wrong? You said you could handle this mission! Get back out there and finish the job!"

The captain nods in approval.
"Nice work. These drug smugglers are getting bolder all the time.
"We've deposited %reward% to your account."

The captain sighs.
"It took us weeks to track down that drug smuggler! We'll have to alert other stations. Maybe they'll be able to pick up the trail.
"Next time, try a little harder. We can't afford to let these smugglers through."
